title: Zach Clough joins Bolton on loan from Nottingham Forest
description: Zach Clough has returned to Bolton Wanderers on loan from Nottingham Forest until the end of the season.
content: The 22-year-old forward left the Macron Stadium to join Forest on deadline day in January 2017, and now returns to the club exactly 12 months later.Clough joined Bolton when he was eight-years-old and went on to make 68 appearances for the club before leaving for the City Ground.However, Clough is yet to score this season having made 17 appearances for Nottingham Forest, and will be hoping to break his duck in the second half of the campaign with Bolton.He is the second Forest player to join Bolton on loan on deadline day following their signing of Tyler Walker earlier on Wednesday.Clough could make his second Bolton debut live on Sky Sports when Bolton host Bristol City in the Championship on Friday night.
